    • game.Assets
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class Assets
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable, com.badlogic.gdx.assets.AssetErrorListener
    Class to organize and structure our assets
    Author:
    Enrique Martín Arenal
